hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.subtitle: Find quick answers to the most common questions about CareerWave.

q1.question: How do I create a profile on CareerWave?
q1.answer: Click "Register" in the top right, select "Register as Candidate" and fill out the form. You can then complete your profile by uploading your resume, adding your skills and entering your work experience.

q2.question: Is CareerWave free for job seekers?
q2.answer: Yes, CareerWave is completely free for job seekers. You can search unlimited jobs, apply and manage your profile without any costs.

q3.question: How can I apply for a job?
q3.answer: Click on a job posting that interests you and select "Apply Now". You can either use your saved resume or add a cover letter. Make sure your profile is up-to-date for the best chances.

q4.question: How can I track my application status?
q4.answer: Go to "My Applications" in your dashboard. There you will see all your applications with their current status: "Submitted", "Under Review", "Interview" or "Rejected". You will also receive email notifications when the status changes.

q1.question: How much does it cost to post a job?
q1.answer: We offer various pricing plans starting from €49/month. The Basic plan includes 1 active job posting, the Professional plan (€149/month) 5 postings and the Enterprise plan (€499/month) unlimited postings. All plans can be paid monthly or annually (with 20% discount).

q2.question: How long does my job posting stay online?
q2.answer: It depends on your chosen plan: Basic (30 days), Professional (60 days) and Enterprise (90 days). You can manually deactivate or extend postings at any time.

q3.question: Can I filter and sort applications?
q3.answer: Yes, in the employer dashboard you can filter applications by various criteria (status, date, qualification) and sort them. Professional and Enterprise plans offer advanced filters and AI-powered candidate matching.

q4.question: Can I add multiple users to my company account?
q4.answer: Yes, with the Professional plan you can add up to 5 team members. The Enterprise plan offers unlimited team members with customizable roles and permissions.

q1.question: How do I change my password?
q1.answer: Go to "Settings" > "Security" and click "Change Password". You must enter your current password and then confirm your new password twice.

q2.question: Can I change my email address?
q2.answer: Yes, under "Settings" > "Profile" you can change your email address. You will receive a confirmation email to the new address that you must confirm.

q3.question: How do I delete my account?
q3.answer: Go to "Settings" > "Account" and select "Delete Account". Please note that this action cannot be undone and all your data will be permanently deleted.

q4.question: How do I manage my notifications?
q4.answer: Under "Settings" > "Notifications" you can choose which email and push notifications you want to receive. You can choose between job recommendations, application updates and newsletters.

q1.question: What payment methods are accepted?
q1.answer: We accept all common credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express), PayPal, SEPA direct debit and invoice (only for Enterprise customers after approval).

q2.question: Can I cancel my plan at any time?
q2.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. For monthly plans, access ends at the end of the current billing period. For annual plans, you will receive a prorated refund.

q3.question: Is there a free trial?
q3.answer: Yes, we offer a 14-day free trial for the Professional plan. No credit card required. You can upgrade or cancel at any time.

q4.question: Will I receive an invoice?
q4.answer: Yes, after each payment you will automatically receive an invoice by email. You can also download all invoices in your account under "Settings" > "Billing".
